error.description: Error message associated with the shipment.

allOf.title: se_id
allOf.description: A string that uniquely identifies a ShipEngine resource, such as a carrier, label, shipment, etc.

shipment_id.description: A string that uniquely identifies the shipment

errors.description: The errors currently associated with the batch

allOf.title: pagination_link
allOf.description: Helpful links to other pages of results

allOf.title: link
allOf.description: A link to a related resource

allOf.title: optional_link
allOf.description: A link to a related resource, or an empty object if there is no resource to link to

href.description: The URL of the linked resource, if any

type.description: The type of resource, or the type of relationship to the parent resource

first.description: The link to the first page of results.  This object will _always_ have an `href` field. If there are no results, then the first page will contain an empty array of items.

allOf.title: link
allOf.description: A link to a related resource

allOf.title: optional_link
allOf.description: A link to a related resource, or an empty object if there is no resource to link to

href.description: The URL of the linked resource, if any

type.description: The type of resource, or the type of relationship to the parent resource

last.description: The link to the final page of results.  This object will _always_ have an `href` field. If there are no results, then the final page will contain an empty array of items.

allOf.title: optional_link
allOf.description: A link to a related resource, or an empty object if there is no resource to link to

href.description: The URL of the linked resource, if any

type.description: The type of resource, or the type of relationship to the parent resource

prev.description: The link to the previous page of results.  The `href` field will only be set when the `page` is 2 or greater.

allOf.title: optional_link
allOf.description: A link to a related resource, or an empty object if there is no resource to link to

href.description: The URL of the linked resource, if any

type.description: The type of resource, or the type of relationship to the parent resource

next.description: The link to the next page of results.  The `href` field will only be set when the `page` is less than `pages`.
